name: Amendola - Mexican San Andres - Corona
additionalNotes: Manufactured at the La Zona factory in Esteli, Nicaragua the Original Red Cannoli (Mexican San Andres) is a decadent treat for the senses. The one that started it all, the boss of bosses, the original BP red Cannoli is deep in rich flavors, full in body and complexity, and will take your palate for a ride. This little firecracker is wrapped in a potent dark Mexican San Andres wrapper with all Nicaraguan binder/fillers.
